external_games.name: The Misadventures of Sigfreid the Dark Elf on Tuesday Night

name: The Misadventures of Sigfreid the Dark Elf on Tuesday Night
storyline:
Man, I'm gone for ONE night looking for light bulbs, and THIS is what happens?

The entire castle has been invaded by my own monsters! Who is responsible for this?

Could it be Bugfreid? My pet warlord beetle that I keep in the basement???

I will put an end to this! Bugfreid will pay for this betrayal!
summary: The Misadventures of Sigfreid the Dark Elf on Tuesday Night is an action game created by Scott Cawthon in 2006.
